Review Text: Great neighborhood pub. Every bartender was friendly and fun. And the regulars were as well.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Great pub vibe and the dude behind the counter is polite and funny!

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Amazing place great atmosphere has pool table and lots of sports TV. In side there is a inner room glass all around for smoking tobacco and weed. Great music. Happy hour 3pm while 6pm and 10pm till 12 pm. All drinks half price. Its situated across from green house weed shop over canal.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Great bar with a smoking room. Best of it's kind that I've found. The locals in the smoke room are a blast. Great happy hour beer discounts. They want you to stay all day! Definitely will be going back on returning visits to Amsterdam. Enjoy.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Very nice surprise. Proper pints (as far as Amsterdam goes), great prices and bar staff are great

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Nice bar. Good space, you can play games and have a drink. Positive thing you can't smoke inside (there is a separated room inside it's allowed to smoke). I didn't really like the fact that almost two hours before the closing, the owner had ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Very Amsterdam bar... the staff is excellent.  Have fun finding the WC

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Just popped in for a quick drink whilst it was raining, nice lively atmosphere. Private smoking section, which is good for the smokers. Not really my kind of music but not offensive.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Nice place , happy hour 2200 2300 good beers and real wodka

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: A large selection of music, went from country and western, to classic dance, house music, well anything that is good. Really enjoyed my night there. If I remember rightly, it is a meeting place for hells angels, behind the bar there were cards from around the world, which was pretty cool.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Had two afternoons here whilst I was in Amsterdam recently.  We managed to get outside seating and the staff are friendly and the drinks are reasonably priced.  It doesn't smell weed but there is a really nice glassed off smoking room where you can roll and smoke away.  Great location close to Dam Square and the Red Light District.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Had a few days here over the sevens weekend. Great food and service. Bar staff are awesome with beautiful views beside the canals. Heaps of local characters. Make sure you stop here for a pint, burger and a couple of cheeky smokes before hitting the red light district.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Great atmosphere, pool table, decent music, separate smoke room. Cheap local beer (particularly during the happy hours), works out cheaper than most other Amsterdam pubs/bars- 3 Euro pints. ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Can't really remember a lot of the night I was in there but as my intention was to go in and do exactly that I guess its good! from what I can remember the atmosphere was great with lots of singing and the bar staff where really friendly to us even though the majority of the people drinking in there were locals.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: I have come to Amsterdam 4 times and there hasn't been a time that not inhabe not come to Susies. ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Awesome music, large place with large smoking room. Happy hour is great value 2 pints for the price of 1 (practicallyüòÄ). Visited susies saloon more than once whilst in amsterdam and Would definitely return as well as l racommend.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Lovely place ,nice view !

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: My favorite bar in Amsterdam. I return every single time i come. The atmosphere is great, the drinks are cheap and they have a separate smoking room. Not only that they have seats out the front so you can relax and watch the canal with your favorite drink and smoke. Plus you have Greenhouse across the road.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: A good place to have a pint of Heineken, which costs ‚Ç¨3 in the happy hour (from 14h to 18h and 22h to 0h). Good music, good decoration. The guy behind the counter was not very nice, though. And they charge ‚Ç¨0,50 if you wish to pay with a credit card, which is absurd.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Cheap drinks and nice music. Happy hours at 10:30 - 00:00. Warm people. Best place for me at Amsterdam. You can drink alcohol and smoke marijuana together at smoking area.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: One of my favourite bars in Amsterdam I've been going for over twenty years and I've never been disappointed, lovely staff decent prices for beer and food. 2 happy hour's a day, pool table sky tv brilliant for sport's highly recommended.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Lovely bar with great music, a pool table. Dogs are allowed. Seperate indoor area if you want to smoke tobacco inside. I wanted a vest with the logo on, it's well cool!

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Good music which you can chose. Big smoking area for weed smoker and most important is that tables are Just opposite to canal side. Not many tourist as well.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: A bit of a spit and sawdust bar, but outside they have seating overlooking the canal - quaint. For those looking for the alternative side of Amsterdam there is a screened of section you are allowed to 'smoke' in.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: I recently moved to Amsterdam and this has become my go to place for after work beers, for a nice breakfast on Saturdays and Sundays and to meet up with cool people. ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Like every bar you go to, they offer a wide selection of drinks.Under 18s are allowed in  but the music is very loud and there is a pool table which is occupied most of the time. They have a smoking room and a machine to buy cigarettes in ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: What a top bar we kept ending up there each day of our 4 nighter in the dam, happy hour ‚Ç¨3.30 a pint. And you can smoke there with coffee shop next door.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Favourite bar in Amsterdam great staff brilliant music.

Review Text:

Toilets are a disaster tho :D

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Excellent staff, great music if you're in to older sounds. Just like a proper pub including a pool table. Good selection of drink at decent prices.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Very unorganised and the waiter keeps forgetting to bring what we ordered, even though we already paid. They also seem quite rude to other people and instead of apologising for the misunderstanding, just tells them to know better. Very unkind, to say the least. Food was fine though:)

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Staff was uneducated and slow moving.  No one could pay any attention to us.  Other guests were upset about bad service.  A group of 15 walked in and one bartender decided to go to lunch because of it.  So he made food and took a break in ‚Ä¶

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Best pint of Guinness so far, so good we had another two, they've got their own smoke room and supply the weird smelling cigs to smoke in there, if that's what you're into

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: I am an American who was traveling europe last summer. I was staying at a hostel right down the way from this bar and couldnt have been more happy. I was in Susie's just about every night for a week. Also a good crowd of people, fair prices on the beer, a good music selection. Overall I would recommend this to anyone.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: This is the bar to go to! The bar staff are just the right amount of cocky and we had a great time there! A great place to drink, play pool and meet other travellers.

Name: Susie's Saloon
Review Text: Cannot fault Susie's. Happy Hour 4-6 everyday with ‚Ç¨3 Grolsch and normal pints around the ‚Ç¨5 mark. Separate smoking part and ideal place to have a few in the afternoon close to the Red Light District
